project.title: ONLINE PAINTING AND ARTWORKS STORE
project.para: Twig is an online store of original paintings and artwork created by artists all over the INDIA. The idea behind the Twig came from the realisation that an artist doesnâ€™t have to be universally recognised or have their work shown in posh galleries in order to be incredibly talented. With that in mind, we set up our website as a portal through which people who appreciate fine art can explore and buy paintings that suits their taste.
